basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.summary: Organized lesson plans and taught children to swim

Designed and established clear objectives for each lesson and effectively communicated those objectives to students
